page.title: 17My Day in Hove By Yasmin
page.content: We live on the top floor of our shop.My dad opens it at 8am.I get up at 7.45am but I can hardly open my eyes.My mum wakes me up and I wake my sisters up.Then I wash to wake myself up,change and go down to breakfast.I eat it in front of the television when I am watching TV AM.Before I go to school I brush my teeth. In school we do a lot of practical lessons like woodwork,science,art and craft,fabric and cookery.My favourite is craft.At 3.35pm we break from school.When I get home I help my mum with housework,clear my room and watch the television.I have to make my own tea because my mum makes samosas for the shop.Then I get ready for bed.
